articles.author: Akshay Syal, M.D.
articles.title: High doses of ADHD drugs linked to a greater risk of psychosis - NBC News
articles.description: Taking a high dose of ADHD drugs is linked to more than five times greater risk of developing psychosis or mania, according to a new study published Thursday in the American Journal of Psychiatry.
articles.content:
Taking a high dose of ADHD drugs is linked to more than five times greater risk of developing psychosis or mania, according to a new study published Thursday in the American Journal of Psychiatry.
